meanings.definition: Having an affinity for neutral dyes.
meanings.sent1: The neutrophilic fabric absorbed the dye evenly.
meanings.sent2: She chose the neutrophilic paint for her bedroom walls.
meanings.sent3: The neutrophilic shirt blended perfectly with the rest of his wardrobe.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a masterpiece, with the neutrophilic colors creating a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The neutrophilic flowers in the garden added a subtle touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a type of white blood cell.
meanings.sent1: The neutrophilic cells play a crucial role in the immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the patient's neutrophilic count to assess infection.
meanings.sent3: The neutrophilic warriors fought bravely against the invading germs.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the neutrophilic defense in her body.
meanings.sent5: The neutrophilic response to the virus was swift and effective.
